typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Arr as string[] (split(toString(Volum), ';'))
}
source(output(
		Trafikkregistreringspunkt as string,
		Navn as string,
		Vegreferanse as string,
		Fra as string,
		Til as string,
		{År} as short,
		{Måned} as short,
		Volum as integer,
		{Konfidensintervall start} as integer,
		{Konfidensintervall slutt} as integer,
		{Dekningsgrad (%)} as string,
		{Antall døgn total} as short,
		{Antall døgn inkludert} as short,
		{Antall døgn ugyldig} as short,
		{Ikke gyldig lengde} as short,
		{Lengdekvalitetsgrad (%)} as string,
		Felt as string,
		{< 5,6m} as integer,
		{>= 5,6m} as short,
		{5,6m - 7,6m} as short,
		{7,6m - 12,5m} as short,
		{12,5m - 16,0m} as short,
		{16,0m - 24,0m} as short,
		{>= 24,0m} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SVV-data.csv']) ~> source1
source1 filter((Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "68804V121330" && Felt == "Totalt i retning Oddernestunnelen") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "02466V121760" && Felt == "Totalt i retning KRISTIANSAND") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "04813V121368" && Felt == "Totalt i retning Kristiansand") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "22540V121303" && Felt == "Totalt i retning KRISTIANSAND") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "16947V121800" && Felt == "Totalt i retning KRISTIANSAND") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "99454V104306" && Felt == "Totalt i retning Lund") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "98936V121303" && Felt == "Totalt i retning Kristiansand") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "73380V121327" && Felt == "Totalt i retning Prestheia")) ~> Filter1
Select1 derive({Tung transport} = {Tung transport}+{5,6m - 7,6m}+{7,6m - 12,5m}+{12,5m - 16,0m}+{16,0m - 24,0m}+{>= 24,0m}) ~> DerivedColumn1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Trafikkregistreringspunkt,
		Navn,
		Dato = Fra,
		Volum,
		Felt,
		{Lett transport} = {< 5,6m},
		{Tung transport} = {>= 5,6m},
		{5,6m - 7,6m},
		{7,6m - 12,5m},
		{12,5m - 16,0m},
		{16,0m - 24,0m},
		{>= 24,0m}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1 filter((Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "68804V121330" && Felt == "Totalt i retning Oddernestunnelen") ||
(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == "22540V121303" && Felt == "Totalt i retning KRISTIANSAND")) ~> Filter2
Filter2 aggregate(groupBy(Fra),
	Volum = collect(concat(Navn, ";", toString(Volum)))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 foldDown(unroll(Volum, Volum),
	mapColumn(
		Dato = Fra,
		Volum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(Prestebekken = case(locate(toString(Volum), 'BEKKEN') != 0, toInteger(split(toString(Volum), ';')[2]))) ~> DerivedColumn2
Filter2 derive(Prestebekken = case(Trafikkregistreringspunkt == '22540V121303', Volum)) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'SVV_Trafikkdata',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Trafikkregistreringspunkt,
		Navn,
		Dato,
		Volum,
		Felt,
		{Lett transport},
		{Tung transport}
	)) ~> sink1
